metadata.name: Unkai Digital Wearable
metadata.description:
PUMA Digital Wearables is a growing collection of limited edition products built with the open and interoperable metaverse in mind.

Owners of the PUMA Pass (https://opensea.io/collection/pumapass) will have access to these drops in the future. 

TOS : https://blackstation.puma.com/terms-of-sale
